name: Bum Burn and Demon Sandwiches
description:
Seek revenge and burn it all down to get to the demon who took you into this void of a land.  I made the game using Unity3D. I chose two themes, burn it down, and void sandwich. I made all of the art in Photoshop using my trackpad (doh!) and the music/ sfx in Ableton Live. I was solo in my game jam adventure. 

Left - W / Left Arrow

Right - D / Right Arrow

Jump - Space Bar

There is currently only a Mac build as I am downloading the resources to build my Windows version right now. Hope to have it up very soon!
